alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Upper Green River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:59PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sublette and south central Fremont Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of South Pass Rest Area, which is also 23 miles northeast of Farson, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... South Pass Rest Area around 415 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include South Pass City, Christina Lake and Upper Silas Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Upper Green River Basin; Wind River Mountains East; Wind River Mountains West
